Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits advertisements for electronic cigarettes, liquid nicotine and hookah tobacco within five hundred feet of a school or park
Summary: Prohibits advertisements for electronic cigarettes, liquid nicotine and hookah tobacco within five hundred feet of a school or park.
LawCode: Add ยง396-aaa, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting advertisements for electronic cigarettes, liquid nicotine and hookah tobacco within five hundred feet of a school or park
